lead_paragraph: Longtime observers of the Cougars program, like Clyde Drexler, say its slide began when it stopped recruiting basketball players from Houston.
snippet: Longtime observers of the Cougars program, like Clyde Drexler, say its slide began when it stopped recruiting basketball players from Houston.
